org.mini2Dx.ecs.system

Class ScreenManagerSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ecs.system.ScreenManagerSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreenManager<GameScreenEntity>, System<GameScreenEntity>

    public class ScreenManagerSystem
extends Object
implements System<GameScreenEntity>, ScreenManager<GameScreenEntity>
    An implementation of ScreenManager as a System suitable for the Entity-Component-System architecture
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman
